evidence.claim: MedicareCon uses AWS for cloud infrastructure to handle sensitive health data.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations, indicating a focus on secure health data handling.
Evidence of using HL7 standards for interoperability in health information exchanges.
They leverage X12 EDI transaction sets for electronic health claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare data exchange with X12 and API integration.
